articles.author: Chris Sutton
articles.title: CHRIS SUTTON: Three reasons why Liverpool's Champions League clash with Villarreal is NOT over - Daily Mail
articles.description: CHRIS SUTTON: I'll be commentating on Tuesday's game and won't be turning up thinking this is done and dusted. Here are my three danger signs for Liverpool ahead of a very big night in Europe.
articles.content:
I landed in Villarreal on Monday to a request - think of three reasons why Liverpool shouldn't think Tuesday's Champions League semi-final second leg is a foregone conclusion. 
I'll be commentating … [+2704 chars]

articles.author: CNN
articles.title: Germany will support an EU oil embargo on Russia - 9News
articles.description: Germany is ready to support a European ban on imports of Russian oil, and won't be "blackmailed" by Moscow into paying for natural gas in rubles.

articles.title: EU may offer Hungary, Slovakia exemptions from Russian oil embargo - Reuters
articles.description: The European Commission may spare Hungary and Slovakia from an embargo on buying Russian oil, now under preparation, wary of the two countries' dependence on Russian crude, two EU officials said on Monday.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, May 2 (Reuters) - The European Commission may spare Hungary and Slovakia from an embargo on buying Russian oil, now under preparation, wary of the two countries' dependence on Russian crude… [+2906 chars]

articles.title: Oil down US$1 on China growth worries, while EU weighs Russian crude ban - CNA
articles.description:
MELBOURNE: Oil prices fell on Monday (May 2) in holiday-sapped trade in Asia as concerns about weak economic growth in China, the world's top oil importer, outweighed fears of potential supply stress from a looming European Union ban on Russian crude.
